name: Nostalgic Fucking Blocks
description:
Hey you! Yeah, you!

Do you love blocks? Do you like games about blocks?

Like Mine*****, Tet***, Th*mas W*s Al**e, etc.?

Well, have I got a "nostalgic" game for you!

Nostalgic Fucking Blocks is a game where you play as a block! Shoot blocks! And shoot down enemies, who are also blocks, with blocks that you fire! YEAH! BLOCKS!

Disclaimer: Nostalgic Fucking Blocks makes use of strong language, such as the f-word, and dark themes. This game was made to parody how the most popular games are squares or blocks.
